shortDescription: Unauthenticated WordPress Options Change vulnerability in Biplob Adhikari's Accordions plugin <= 2.0.2 at WordPress.
vulnerabilityName: Biplob Adhikari's Accordions plugin Unauthenticated WordPress Options Change Vulnerability
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
